ComicInfo.Title: 12 Munchkies; Chick-On-Head
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE FUTURE! Everyone lives underground now. The shadowy government decides to send someone back in time to rectify past mistakes. The time traveller runs into other time travellers, including a cyborg hunter sent to “terminate” a military leader, two high school kids on an Excellent Adventure, a crazy doctor and a young man who seem to be travelling back to the past/future, and Jeanne Claude Van Damme as a TIMEC--uh, Policeman. Turns out the future was messed up by all these conflicting time-travelling jerks.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Evan Dahm | 1 | Var | 1:10 Variant Cover | Paul Maybury | 2 |
